bibl.title: The Sinful Woman in the Gospel of Peter: Reconstructing the Other Side of P. Oxy. 4009. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: P. Oxy. LX, 4009 (= LDAB 4872). - 1. The side reconstructed by Dieter Lührmann. - 2. Reconstruction of the enigmatic other side. - 3. Conclusion and a further task.
bibl.seg: Myllykoski Matti, The Sinful Woman in the Gospel of Peter: Reconstructing the Other Side of P. Oxy. 4009. Avec résumé en anglais.
P. Oxy. LX, 4009 (= LDAB 4872). - 1. The side reconstructed by Dieter Lührmann. - 2. Reconstruction of the enigmatic other side. - 3. Conclusion and a further task.
